Dead By Daylight é claramente a inspiração dos jogos de terror hoje em dia. É uma mistura de terror, suspense, horror e ação que proporciona ao jogador uma adrenalina e tensão surreal. Se você é uma pessoa medrosa, com certeza tomará sustos aqui. Caso seja mais corajoso, o que lhe faltar de pavor será substituído pela adrenalina.

Dead By Daylight é um jogo multiplayer em que 4 jogadores devem cooperar entre si para fugir do assassino, este cuja identidade é d um 5º jogador, que tem como objetivo assassinar todos os outros. Você pode jogar com amigos ou sozinho, mas sempre será online. O estilo de jogo certamente já é bastante conhecido, mas DBD foi um dos que o popularizou em jogos de terror. "Então o jogo é velho já? As pessoas não pararam de jogar, já que é online." Não! As pessoas continuam a jogar independente do tempo que passe e novas atualizações sempre vão aparecendo, inserindo assassinos famosos dos filmes de terror, como o Michael Miers, Fred Krugger, Jigsaw, o Pânico, Nemesis (RE 3) e vários outros.

Vem jogar logo.

ive play since release on ps4 so i guess i can make a review. The Survivor side is a pretty boring and easy experience in my opinion u sit on a gen for 90 seconds holding m1 or u get chased which is more interesting but ofc dont expect to then just hold the chase forever since thats not possible against a good killer. The killerside in this game is more interesting with all the abilitys u can play with, its basically the opposite of the survivor side, ur pretty much always under pressure and its a overall a hard match. Theres also perks in this game which makes both sides fun, but i gotta say ur not getting all the perks that fast, it took me 700 hours to get them all, but since theres this new prestiging is now out it should not take that long. Overally this games community is absolutely garbage im not talking about everyone but most of them are just toxic or doing toxic stuff which is really annoying. If im really honest u shouldnt buy this game its gonna make u rage more then having fun.

I've lost friends and loved ones to because of this absolute dumpster fire of a game. and with that said, anybody down for SFW

Extremely fun game with a wide selection of survivors and killers to play as. You can build your optimal killer and climb the rankings or you can play a more casual style of play by trying to complete challenges for unique charms and skins. Every killer bolsters a unique power that sets them apart from each other. The huge teachable perk list can let you mix and match with your favorites to make a fun build with many perks offering something really cool. The mechanics of this game are phenomenal and is very much free to play but you can spend like 10 dollars to get the season pass which if completed will allow you to buy another with the cumulative auric cells given through many checkpoints.

so, dead by daylight is one of the best worst games ever. it runs poorly but well enough to give you hope. sometimes when you vault that window you just might not get hit, sometimes when you use head on you wont get grabbed by the killer before leaving the locker, sometimes you and all your little survivor friends escape. but other times, everything falls apart. your friends get tunneled and you get mori'd on hatch. but with over 1000 hours in this game i can say, without a shadow of a doubt. it's b tier but good with friends.
Don't wast your money on this game.
